Martha and Mary
Now while they were on their way, Jesus entered a village [called Bethany], and a woman named Martha welcomed Him into her home.
She had a sister named Mary, who seated herself at the Lord’s feet and was  listening to His teaching.

But Martha was very busy  distracted with all of her serving responsibilities; and she approached Him and said, “Lord, is it of no concern to You that my sister has left me to do the serving alone? Tell her to help me  do her part.”
